Replace.Text: Exclusive unique Family Governor: Rossati, Bellone and Saluzzo. Domestic luxury resource tiles can be charged Protection racket by Land close combat units, and corresponding output and additional [ICON_GOLD] gold can be provided according to the resource base yield bonus. If charge multiple Protection racket for the same tile in 30 turns(on Standard Speed), you will get a series of negative effects, including: [NEWLINE] City Development [ICON_PRESSUREDOWN] Deceleration[NEWLINE]City-1 [ICON_AMENITIESINSUFFICIENT] Entertainment, [NEWLINE]City-1 [ICON_HOUSINGINSUFFICIENT] population, [NEWLINE]Luxury resources [ICON_PILLAGED] depletion, [NEWLINE]City [ICON_BARBARIAN] mutiny.

Domestic luxury resource tiles can be charged Protection racket by Land close combat units, and corresponding output and additional [ICON_GOLD] gold can be provided according to the resource base yield bonus. If charge multiple Protection racket for the same tile in 30 turns(on Standard Speed), you will get a series of negative effects, including: [NEWLINE] City Development [ICON_PRESSUREDOWN] Deceleration[NEWLINE]City-1 [ICON_AMENITIESINSUFFICIENT] Entertainment, [NEWLINE]City-1 [ICON_HOUSINGINSUFFICIENT] population, [NEWLINE]Luxury resources [ICON_PILLAGED] depletion, [NEWLINE]City [ICON_BARBARIAN] mutiny.
Domestic luxury resource tiles can be charged Protection racket by melee units.

Replace.Text: A district unique to Siracusa, replaces the Theater Square district and cheaper to build. +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture bonus for adjacent City Center and Luxury Resource tile.[NEWLINE][ICON_GOLD] Gold double to its adjacency bonus.

A district unique to Siracusa, replaces the Theater Square district and cheaper to build. Awards a [ICON_GOVERNOR] Governor Title when completed. +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture bonus for adjacent City Center and Luxury Resource tile.[NEWLINE][ICON_GOLD] Gold double to its adjacency bonus.

A district unique to Siracusa, replaces the Theater Square district and cheaper to build. +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture bonus for adjacent City Center and luxury resource tile.[NEWLINE][ICON_GOLD] Gold double to its adjacency bonus.

A district unique to Siracusa, replaces the Theater Square district and cheaper to build. Awards a [ICON_GOVERNOR] Governor Title when completed. +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture bonus for adjacent City Center and luxury resource tile.[NEWLINE][ICON_GOLD] Gold double to its adjacency bonus.
+{1_num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture bonus for adjacent Luxury Resource tile.
+{1_num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture bonus for adjacent City Center.

Siracusa unique unit, cannot be trained or promoted, and can only be purchased with gold. Only adjacent enemy units can reveal this unit, and ignore zone control areas when moving. Has Combat Strength fix equal to the strongest ranged unit your cities have produced. When attacking units, gain 3 temporary [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength from each friendly unit that died in battle in the previous 10 turns.

Siracusa unique unit, cannot be trained or promoted, and can only be purchased with gold. Only adjacent enemy units can reveal this unit, and ignore zone control areas when moving. Has Combat Strength fix equal to the strongest ranged unit your cities have produced. When attacking units, gain 3 temporary [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength from each friendly unit that died in battle in the previous 10 turns.

A peerless assassin loyal to his famiglia. The shadows serve his will, and he knows murder better than the back of his hand. He can be found in the background of every secret that has allowed his famiglia to rise and flourish, and those who have seen his true face are already buried six feet under.
Movement not affected by zone control (Famiglia Silent Cleaner)
Has Combat Strength fix equal to the strongest ranged unit your cities have produced.
When attacking units, gain 3 temporary [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength from each friendly unit that died in battle in the previous 10 turns.
One of the twelve round tables in the Grey Hall, skilled in exploring and enterprising

Provides -1 Loyalty per turn in this city. +5% [ICON_SCIENCE] Science for each different improved Luxury resource they have within 3 tiles. +1 [ICON_SCIENCE] Science if city with an established [ICON_GOVERNOR] Governor.
Unlock the Rossati family base, obtain the Rossati family base in the capital when first appointed. +25% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production speed toward Rossati family base in assigned city.
For cities with a Rossati family base, district buildings +1 corresponding yield to district output (gold +2).
For cities with a Rossati family base, +25% [ICON_GREATPERSON] Great People points generated per turn.
For cities assigned, -20% cost when purchasing units, and all Settler trained get +2 [ICON_MOVEMENT] Movement.
For cities assigned, enable to built one more district than the [ICON_CITIZEN] population limit allows if having Theater.
For cities assigned, all Builders trained get +1 build charge. For cities with a Rossati family base, +4 [ICON_SCIENCE] Science from each [ICON_GREATWORK_WRITING] Great Work of Writing.
While active, each of your Citizens here exerts -1 Loyalty pressure to this city. Once completed, the family base was taken by the Rossati family.
One of the twelve round tables in the Grey Hall, skilled in strategy and management.
Provides -1 Loyalty per turn in this city. Theater gain standard culture adjacency bonus from adjacent districts. +3 [ICON_GOLD] Gold if city with an established [ICON_GOVERNOR] Governor.

Unlock the Bellone family base, obtain the Bellone family base in the capital when first appointed. +50% [ICON_PRODUCTION] production speed to "Bellone seizes the family base" projects in assigned city.
For cities with a Bellone family base, gets +25% [ICON_PRODUCTION] production speed towards Wonders, each Wonders provide +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture.
For cities with a Bellone family base, +100% adjacency bonuses to Theater
For cities assigned, -20% cost when purchasing buildings.
For cities assigned, All Theater buildings provide +4 [ICON_GOLD] Gold for international [ICON_TRADEROUTE] Trade Routes.

For cities assigned, all district provide [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism equal to its [ICON_CULTURE] Culture adjacency bonus. For cities with a Bellone family base, districts provide +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture.
While active, each of your Citizens here exerts -1 Loyalty pressure to this city. Once completed, the family base was taken by the Bellone family.
One of the twelve round tables in the Grey Hall, skilled in force and struggle
Provides -1 Loyalty per turn in this city. +50% combat experience for all units trained.+4 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production towards Units if city with an established [ICON_GOVERNOR] Governor.
Unlock the Saluzzo family base, obtain the Saluzzo family base in the capital when first appointed. +25% [ICON_PRODUCTION] production speed to military units in assigned city.
For cities with a Saluzzo family base, +2 [ICON_AMENITIES] Amenity for cities with a garrisoned unit.
For cities with a Saluzzo family base, provides you with 1 of each Strategic resource per turn that you have revealed but have not improved.

For cities assigned, mlitary units trained in this city start with a free promotion (does not stack), and Combat victories provide [ICON_CULTURE] Culture equal to 50% of the [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength of the defeated unit.
For cities assigned, trained mlitary units +100% Flanking and Support Bonus.

For cities assigned, promoting a unit does not end that unit‚Äôs turn. For cities with a Saluzzo family base, +5 [ICON_STRENGTH] City Defense and receive a second melee unit each time you train a melee unit.
While active, each of your Citizens here exerts -1 Loyalty pressure to this city. Once completed, the family base was taken by the Saluzzo family.
Combat victories provide [ICON_CULTURE] Culture equal to 50% of the [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength of the defeated unit.(Saluzzo)
Promoting a unit does not end that unit‚Äôs turn(Saluzzo)

Leontuzzo Bellone, you cut off the glory of the old family, and Volsinii drives in a new direction in your hands. When you sit opposite Signora Sicilia and face her random but fatal problems, you can only tell her your most true thoughts and honestly, and your method is not unchangeable. You cannot assert that Siracusa will change for you, but you know that what you are about to do will leave a strong mark on Siracusa's land. And you will give everything for it.

The last leader of Siracusa's Bellone Family, and one of the mayoral candidates for Siracusa's Nuova Volsinii special administrative city. Through Operator Texas, he has formed a relationship with Rhodes Island on behalf of the city he represents. [NEWLINE]He excels in mid-range combat, and exhibits comparable strategy and leadership abilities across a variety of tasks.

All mlitary units gain -10 [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength, but provide +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold which increase with Eras. [NEWLINE]Obtain the unit "Wolfpack" after establishing the city, and then obtain a "Wolfpack" in city every 25 turns(on Standard Speed), with a maximum limit of 3.
Each mlitary unit can provide +1/+2/+3/+4/+5/+6/+7/+8/+9 [ICON_GOLD] GoldÔºåincrease with Eras(Vigil)

Vigil unique unit, cannot be trained or promoted.Has base [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength equal to the strongest unit your cities have produced. Receive +4 [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength for every adjacent Wolfpack.

Vigil unique unit, cannot be trained or promoted.Has base [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength equal to the strongest unit your cities have produced. Receive +4 [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength for every adjacent Wolfpack.
+4 [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength for every adjacent Wolfpack

Cellinia Texas, your blood flows with the will of Texas, no matter how you evade it. The night view of Longmen is still colorful, and when you wake up from your dreams, the wilderness of the past will still envelop you. Calm down and listen, it's the howl from the wolf pack, it's the call from the wilderness. Come back, wolf of Texas, you should have carried out the will of the Texas family. It's time to come back and face everything directly.
Texas is a Penguin Logistics staff member who is extraordinary skilled in single combat. She was assigned as liaison to Rhodes Island, where she assisted with many different operations.
Extra territory upon founding cities.Reduces the cost of purchasing a tile by 30%.

Extra territory upon founding cities.Reduces the cost of purchasing a tile by 30%. Each terrain within the 3 grid range of the city provides 1% corresponding output bonus for the city, including grass (food), plain (productivity), desert (culture), snow (technology), tundra (faith), lake and coast (gold).

Lavinia Falcone, as a judge, you have received some recognition from Sicily. This may still be regarded as the promotion of justice on the shoulder of some power, but this time you really have enough freedom, and have to face more things that you haven't had time to think about before. The establishment of a new order is not an easy task. Compared to destroying a system, building a new one is always much more difficult, let alone failing to truly bring Siracusa out of the control of the family. Fortunately, the hammer of the trial will truly fall, and the only question is how to make justice fall on more people.
A former Siracusan city judge, hoping to do right by law and justice.

Happy cities receive +2 Yields from Campuses, Commercial Hubs, Industrial Zone and Theater Squares in tiles above Average, Ecstatic cities receive +4 Yields. [NEWLINE]Each Amenities provides 0.2 [ICON_SCIENCE] Science, 0.2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture, and 0.4 [ICON_GOLD] Gold for each population, with the increase halved after 10 Amenities.

Penance unique district, replaces the Government Plaza, does not require population and cheaper to build, enable to switch building in district through project. Ignore the decrease of Appeal made by those Features (like Marsh, Rainforest, and so on) within your civilization. Provides +6 Loyalty per turn, and +2 [ICON_AMENITIES] Amenities to each city center within 6 tiles.

Penance unique district, replaces the Government Plaza, does not require population and cheaper to build, enable to switch building in district through project. Ignore the decrease of Appeal made by those Features (like Marsh, Rainforest, and so on) within your civilization. Provides +6 Loyalty per turn, and +2 [ICON_AMENITIES] Amenities to each city center within 6 tiles.

Cellinia Texas, should you claim power, or at least associate herself with it, in the name of the greater good? Texas knows that the answer should be "yes," yet you have chosen to distance herself from Vigil and Penance. Your line of thinking is simple. You do not belong to that greater good; you are simply one of the common folk, who felt outraged out of the goodness of her heart. Her only promise to Vigil was that you would keep fighting, until either Siracusa has changed, or you are no more.
Penguin Logistics employee, last surviving member of the Texas family, excellent solo combat ability.

Land unit gains ability of jump, which distance increases with the Eras. Military units on land can cause damage and -1 movement to surrounding enemy upon landing. The military unit restores [ICON_DAMAGED] health and [ICON_MOVEMENT] movement after killing unit for the first time, and refreshes again after promotion.
Land unit gains ability of jump a distance equal to it's maximum Movement, which distance increases every two eras from the Ancient Era.(Texas the Omertosa)

Lappland Saluzzo, a lone wolf. You have lost your family forever and will never join another family again. What exactly supports you to live to the present day? Perhaps your injuries can be treated, but how can the madness in your heart be cured.

Lappland's real identity is unknown, her background a mystery. She has demonstrated impressive destructive prowess in tactical assaults and search-and-destroy missions. [NEWLINE]She is currently a special ops Operator for Rhodes Island.

Attack from units will disables the target's special ability when attacking, lasting 2 turns. All combat units +6 [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat strength vs. fortified defenderÔºåIgnoring the debuff of terrain and feature. Does not suffer combat penalties when damaged.
Attack from units will disable the target's special ability when attacking, lasting 2 turns.(Lappland)
Disable some special ability, lasting 2 turns.(Lappland)
All combat units +6 [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat strength vs. fortified defender.(Lappland)
All combat units ignore the debuff of terrain and feature. Does not suffer combat penalties when damaged.(Lappland)

Row.Text: With the waves he's stirred, he's pessimistic about getting the last laugh. He's not giving up, though, never.
Vigil
Leontuzzo, ex-heir to Famiglia Bellone, simply a Siracusan citizen these days.

The last leader of Siracusa's Bellone Family, and one of the mayoral candidates for Siracusa's Nuova Volsinii special administrative city. Through Operator Texas, he has formed a relationship with Rhodes Island on behalf of the city he represents. [NEWLINE]He excels in mid-range combat, and exhibits comparable strategy and leadership abilities across a variety of tasks.

Imaging tests reveal clear, normal outlines of internal organs, and no abnormal shadows have been detected. Originium granules have not been detected in the circulatory system and there is no sign of infection. At this time, this operator is believed to be uninfected. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][Cell-Originium Assimilation] 0% [NEWLINE]Operator Vigil shows no signs of Originium infection. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][Blood Originium-Crystal Density] 0.13u/L [NEWLINE]Operator Vigil rarely comes into contact with Originium.

A taciturn Lupo youth. [NEWLINE]Though he declined to disclose his identity, the fact that he comes from Siracusa, coupled with his not-particularly-subtle attire, makes it fairly easy to guess what Vigil's background might be. As such, when he first visited Rhodes Island, a hushed silence followed wherever he went. [NEWLINE]But this situation was quickly dispelled before it could turn into trouble‚Äì [NEWLINE]During lunchtime, Chiave, a fellow Siracusan, greeted him cheerfully. Aosta and Broca, who were with him at the time, seemed reluctant to show their faces. However, the scenario that people were expecting to break out did not unfold, and Vigil had a calm and cordial conversation with Chiave's gang. [NEWLINE]This conversation ended with Chiave's arm around Vigil's shoulder, and Chiave proclaiming to the surrounding operators that his gang would celebrate Vigil's arrival. [NEWLINE]According to the recollection of an operator present at the time: [NEWLINE]"Had people not already been familiar with Chiave's personality, they might've mistaken him for the one with the higher status back there."

Establishing ties with Nuova Volsinii was an unexpected opportunity for Rhodes Island, but also poses its own risks. [NEWLINE]The reason has nothing to do with Vigil; the city is simply too unique. [NEWLINE]The city is a special administrative region acknowledged by Signora Sicilia, where the mafias are not allowed to enter or peddle their influence. Of all the countries across this land, perhaps only in Siracusa can a city like this ‚Äì independent of the existing powers ‚Äì pop up out of thin air without causing widespread panic and backlash. [NEWLINE]The existence of this city undeniably represents a future recognized by Signoria Sicilia, a challenge to authority that may well unfold in Siracusa; however, it is also destined to stand in opposition to the other mafias. [NEWLINE]Vigil sought out Rhodes Island on the basis of medical needs. [NEWLINE]As a rule, Rhodes Island normally tries to avoid cooperating with such politically sensitive entities. However, when Operator Texas brought him and Penance before Dr. Kal'tsit's office, the situation became much more complicated. [NEWLINE]He made no effort to conceal the events that had unfolded in Old Volsinii. His vision of the future ultimately moved Rhodes Island, and so this relationship was realized. [NEWLINE]His reason for choosing to become an operator seems almost ordained by fate ‚Äì what he said was, he saw how Rhodes Island gathered people from all across the land and all walks of life, and he wanted to spend more time communicating with and learning from them. [NEWLINE]He displayed a genuine thirst for knowledge of things beyond Siracusa, and his humility has won him the acknowledgement of most operators. [NEWLINE]As such, he has already made many friends, and they openly speak highly of him. [NEWLINE]It can even be said that Vigil's arrival changed many peoples' impressions of Siracusans. [NEWLINE]Consequently, this has also led him to stay at Rhodes Island for longer periods of time than his identity allows, which Penance frequently berates him for.

As long as Vigil and Penance are both on the landship at the same time, you will see them dining together. [NEWLINE]In order to avoid complicated rumors, after Penance joined Rhodes Island, Vigil would introduce her to the other operators as a big sister figure. While Penance has not really admitted to this point, she has also not gone out of her way to deny it. [NEWLINE]However, it is no mystery that both Penance and her ideals are special to him. [NEWLINE]"I was brought up to be the famiglia's heir. From the very beginning, I've always been pursuing ways of expanding the famiglia's power, and ways of doing my job more efficiently. I'm not such a noble person." During a chat with the Doctor, when the topic of his origins came up, he smiled and explained: "Now that I think about it, that was from before when Famiglia Texas was liquidated. As the power and influence of the Colombian[sic] famiglie grew, some of their ideals and practices started to leak over into Siracusa as well. For better or worse, Siracusa's famiglie also started to become more 'civilized,' and that affected me to some degree as well." [NEWLINE]"Originally, I was going to become someone who would stop at nothing to secure advantages for the famiglia. But, Lavinia... Alright, I'll call her Penance here, since she seems to like that codename. Anyways, after my father brought her into the famiglia, things changed." [NEWLINE]After getting to this point, Vigil paused for a while, as if carefully considering his words. "So many things happened along the way, including her dispute with my father. In the end, she decided to accept the position of judge that he arranged for her, but this isn't a story you should be hearing from me ‚Äì ask her yourself if you're interested. Looking back, in the process of learning as much as I could to become an effective leader of the famiglia, I not only learned about Siracusa's rules and Columbia's cunning, but also of the justice she had never given up." [NEWLINE]"Unfortunately, Demetri had always been tasked with the responsibility of intel gathering, so he was always running around and had little time to talk to Penance. If he had the same opportunities as me, maybe we wouldn't have turned out like this." He let out a sigh. "Forget it, let's not talk about this anymore." [NEWLINE]"In any case, Doctor, I see Penance as a superbly upstanding person. For her to be able to hold onto her ideals in a place like Siracusa is an incredibly rare and precious thing. Plus, my mother passed away at a young age, and my father... though we didn't have a bad relationship by any means, there were certain things that I could not easily share with him, so..." He suddenly showed some hesitation and paused for a while when he got to this point, before finally continuing: "When I was still relatively young, she played both an older sister role, as well as..." [NEWLINE]"Vigil, I need to talk to you about the planning of the new city. Also, I heard the quality of your work hasn't been up to par lately; have you been staying up late again?" From not too far away came a clear, pristine female voice. Without a doubt, it belonged to Penance. [NEWLINE]"Uhh... Doctor, if you'd excuse me." Vigil stood up and trotted towards the voice, mumbling justifications for himself as he ran: "It's not like I held up the project or anything." [NEWLINE]In that rare moment, he appeared to be just another impetuous, fearless youth.
Packleader's Dignity

Likes civilizations who have the same Luxury resources as he does, and will try to collect every Luxury resource available. Hates barbarians. Does not like civilizations that ignore barbarian outposts.
(Your luxury taste is the same as him)
Vigil is happy you have controlled the same luxuries that he has
(You cannot protect your own citizens)
How can you let those Barbarians run amok so close to your home?

Replace.Text: Bene, I'll give you a hand, if you insist. But do remember, I expect you to come up with a plan that's worth my while. Do not disappoint me.
We have much more important things to do.

The old ways make it impossible to find a new path. If the new Siracusa is built on violence, it will fall back into the same well. The destruction of a few individual famiglie is far, far from enough. We must kick the entire 'habit.'
Hey. Is our 'cooperation' just me watching you sleep?
Va bene. Let's see if your plan is worthy of my work.
They'll be sleeping with the fins in no time.
Buongiorno. I am Famiglia Bellone's... Lasci perdere. My famiglia doesn't exist anymore, but that was the price we paid to buy change in Siracusa.
Anything outside the plan, I'll judge for myself.
Va bene. Let's see if your plan is worthy of my work.
If you want to show respect to the Siracusans, then hire a proper Siracusan chef.
None of these documents matter at all. The only thing that matters is how you act.

What do you want to know? Secrets of the Siracusan famiglie? There's hardly anything worth mentioning there. The things we do are no different from the wolves fighting in the wilderness thousands of years ago. Only, time has taught us some new tricks. Heh, you see 'order' could be the official name for 'tearing your prey to pieces.'
Anything outside the plan, I'll judge for myself.
Bravo. I was right to partner with you.
Are we done yet? What are you looking all smug for?
Careful with the moisture-proofing. I hate the smell of rotting wood.
None of these documents matter at all. The only thing that matters is how you act.

The disputes among the famiglie were petty and stupid. The dons clung on to whatever authority they had, thinking they were the masters of Siracusa. But I invite you, Doctor, to join me in shaping a new era.
Do you need me to walk you through this? Ma dai! Whack them already.

Row.Text: Are you having fun? Because I'm not.
Are you having fun? Because I'm not.
Va bene. Let's see if your plan is worthy of my work.
And what purpose do you think your sacrifice will serve?
Our purpose is not violence itself, but rather the victory it brings.
And what purpose do you think your sacrifice will serve?
Let's put an end to this show, pronto.
Our partnership has been productive. A made man would sell out anybody for his ambitions, but I can promise you one thing: you've bought my loyalty with yours.
Anything outside the plan, I'll judge for myself.
Our partnership has been productive. A made man would sell out anybody for his ambitions, but I can promise you one thing: you've bought my loyalty with yours.
Texas delivery never goes wrong. If there is an error, it must be the recipient's problem.
Texas
Texas is a Penguin Logistics staff member who is extraordinary skilled in single combat. She was assigned as liaison to Rhodes Island, where she assisted with many different operations.

Texas is often one of the first agents to enter the battlefield. With her abilities, we can build a first line of defense and accelerate the guidance of other agents to their positions. Her sword rain infused with Originium Arts can often hinder the movement of enemies on a large scale. Carefully observe the battlefield and deploy it to the appropriate location, she will not disappoint you.

Imaging test for this Operator showed clear outline of internal organs without any unusual dark spot. No unusual traces of Originium particles present in her system, no signs of infection, confirming her as non-infected. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][Cell-Originium Assimilation] 0% [NEWLINE]Operator Texas showed no symptoms of Oripathy. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][Blood Originium-Crystal Density] 0.12u/L [NEWLINE]Operator Texas sometimes delivers packages with Originium content, but it has not caused infection to date.

A taciturn messenger. [NEWLINE]According to her own account, she's not hiding anything, but just has nothing to say. [NEWLINE]Though she gives off the impression of preferring to be alone, she is often seen with her fellow Penguin Logistics members.

While Texas may be quiet, her fighting style is anything but. It's best described as tempestuous. [NEWLINE]At Rhodes Island, Operators without formal training are actually the majority, but when it comes to the use of weapons, most will follow established protocols. Texas, however, doesn't. [NEWLINE]While she is a bit more reserved now, one can still see vestiges of an idea that she herself might not be aware of - her belief that the singular purpose of all weaponry is to kill.

Her Lupo origin, her conspicuous fur color, her notable combat style, and of course, her name, all point to her ties with the faded Texas family, a once-famous clan whose name is now forgotten to most. [NEWLINE]If that's the case, Texas's past is probably astonishing beyond imagination, as indicated by the Texas name itself. [NEWLINE]On one hand, even with Rhodes Island's intel network, very little is known about the family's fate. On the other hand, Texas never felt the need to elaborate her past, so there isn't a pressing need to delve into it. After all, her past may one day catch up to her, just as she predicts.
Private Field Supply Package
Likes civilizations that trade Luxury resources to her. Dislikes civilizations that have not made such a trade. Tries to collect as many copies of Luxury resources as possible.

Replace.Text: My next mission is to protect you.
Code name Texas. I'm responsible for driving, moving cargo, and keeping our people safe. Try to get the mission briefings as concise as possible, please.
My next mission is to protect you.
Is it time for a break?
Do you need any supplies? Just let me know.
Our job is to deliver life and death.
I'm not good at barking orders.
Do you need any supplies? Just let me know.
Our job is to deliver life and death.

Row.Text: I may have underestimated this operation.
I may have underestimated this operation.
This will work as payment.
Hah!
A few of them got through.
Cut them to pieces!
I may have underestimated this operation.
Do you need any supplies? Just let me know.
You can't stop me.
Do you need any supplies? Just let me know.
A solid wooden mallet. The more you can feel the lightness of picking it up, the more you can feel the weight of knocking it down.
Penance
Former Siracusan judge who became acquainted with Rhodes Island through Operator Texas. Currently works in the Logistics Department and serves as legal counsel for Rhodes Island.

Penance always carries a certain ideal, hoping to protect the weak people and practice the justice of the code under the influence of the family. Therefore, Siracusa leader by Penance can receive feedback on the happiness of the people, significantly improving regional and population output. However, more population means greater chaos, and how to choose between population and urban happiness in order to achieve maximum output is still a path that needs to be explored for Penance.

Imaging tests reveal clear, normal outlines of internal organs, and no abnormal shadows have been detected. Originium granules have not been detected in the circulatory system and there is no sign of infection. At this time, this operator is believed to be uninfected. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][Cell-Originium Assimilation] 0% [NEWLINE]Operator Penance shows no signs of Originium infection. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][Blood Originium-Crystal Density] 0.12u/L [NEWLINE]Operator Penance rarely comes into contact with Originium.

Former Siracusan judge. [NEWLINE]During her entrance interview, Operator Penance said that she came to make amends for her past mistakes, telling us that she had been made to betray justice against her will. [NEWLINE]Our investigation into events at Siracusa reveals that Penance was made judge with the support of the Bellone family, but unlike other mafia-backed judges, she was not entirely subject to the will of the Bellones, being willing to pronounce guilty sentences for members of the family, something which is almost unheard of in Siracusa. She also maintains a sibling-like relationship with Vigil, leading us to believe that the Bellone family may not be your average Siracusan mafia family. We know little about the former don of the Bellones, however, so more information in this regard must await further discussion with Penance and Vigil. [NEWLINE]There were doubts as to whether Penance would be able to adapt to Rhodes Island's legal department, given her clear stance on the inviolability of law and justice, as well as the fact that Rhodes Island often operates in legal grey areas. However, she has shown a proper understanding of our true mission; rather than coming into conflict with operators who have different methods from her, they seem to have an implicit understanding, even quietly helping each other out. Perhaps those who are well-versed in the legal world understand that, deep down, they share the common goal of defending justice, no matter what circumstances may have forced them to do, and no matter what means they use now.

Penance described the Siracusan legal system in detail. [NEWLINE]Nomadic cities in Siracusa are ruled by their respective mafia families, and the legal systems of these cities are an extension of family rule. There are no police, only judges who are responsible for public order, speaking the will of Signora Sicilia. [NEWLINE]The vast majority of incidents are taken care of under the table by the families involved, most of them never making it to court. The judges themselves are often informed after the fact that a case has been resolved, or, in some cases, needs them to resolve it quietly. Even when a case does make it to court, the outcome of the trial is often influenced or outright decided by the family. [NEWLINE]Those who knew Penance during her time as Judge Lavinia called her a "righteous" judge. In Siracusa, judges labeled as such often end up disappearing or losing part of a limb, as a warning to the other judges. [NEWLINE]Penance never ended up that way, though she never thought of herself as particularly righteous. [NEWLINE]She told us that she became a judge with the help of the Bellone family. When she was first appointed, the former don of the family had promised her a better future, where she would truly deliver the justice of the law. The nature of the Bellone family seemed to have given her more freedom, but also more pain, as she saw such justice delivered by the family as inherently unjust. [NEWLINE]Still, Penance has never allowed her troubles to affect those around her, nor demanded the same of others as she does of herself, as in the case of Vigil, for example. This is mostly because they came from the same place, of course, and Vigil does not exactly lead a healthy lifestyle. As such, most of the other operators show an understanding.

"We just finished. Won't you congratulate me, Lavinia?" [NEWLINE]"...What is it?" [NEWLINE]"I've always envied your Bellone backing. Things will go much smoother now that I have famiglia support myself." [NEWLINE]"And it feels good to have somebody at your back." [NEWLINE]"I would never have let myself look the way you do now, Lavinia, if I were you." [NEWLINE]"...How many years have you been a judge?" [NEWLINE]"About two." [NEWLINE]"Why do you ask?" [NEWLINE]"I saw Bortolotti today." [NEWLINE]"Who's that?" [NEWLINE]"A... judge." [NEWLINE]"Now an assassin. He died today, right in front of my eyes. An arrow went through him." [NEWLINE]"I'm lucky to be alive." [NEWLINE]"Let's just say I never heard anything..." [NEWLINE]"Did you think it was a good thing? Do you feel better now that you have a famiglia behind you? Having a famiglia support is what you're proudest about, as a judge?" [NEWLINE]"No, it's not my place to reproach you. Bortolotti is dead. He abandoned his ideals before he died, but he held on to his appointment letter. Meanwhile, I'm still here today, breathing and in one piece, because everyone knows that the Bellones are behind Judge Lavinia." [NEWLINE]"How did the rule of law come to this in Siracusa? I sit with the mafiosi every day, listening to them telling me what to do, and I do everything in my power to do it well, because it's 'better' for everyone. Everyone goes about their business as usual the next day, because I did." [NEWLINE]"But I can see the fear in the eyes of the common folk, the way they keep their distance. After the sentence is pronounced, they dare not cry where there are prying eyes, or make their appeals to a judge." [NEWLINE]"What am I doing? Defending the law? Justice? Society? Public order? None of the above. All the judges, all the courts; the entire legal system of Siracusa is designed to be an accomplice for the mafia." [NEWLINE]"The people who had high ideals are dead. But I'm alive, and you're alive. I couldn't do anything, while you boast about having famiglia backing." [NEWLINE]"There but for the grace of the mafia, goes the law of Siracusa." [NEWLINE]"...You're drunk, Lavinia." [NEWLINE]"I'm not." [NEWLINE]"YES, YOU ARE. I'll be going." [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]‚ÄìRecorded in the judges' lounge
Law Is Order
Keeps his citizens happy and loyal. Impressed by those with similar priorities. Dislikes those with happiness/loyalty issues.
(Your city is highly livable)
She likes a civilization where citizens are happy and happy
(Your citizens need higher livability)
She hates the unhappy civilization of citizens

Replace.Text: I am honored to earn your support. We can certainly work together and offer mutual assistance.
Contempt for the law is a crime. The words of my codex will prove their own worth.
This place is nothing like stagnant, old Siracusa. The breath of hope flows here.
I am honored to earn your support. We can certainly work together and offer mutual assistance.
Contempt for the law is a crime. The words of my codex will prove their own worth.
So much violence in the name of order...
This gavel of justice is weighty. Spero che siate pronti.

If you ever get a chance to visit Siracusa, please avoid the rainy season. However, if you really are that unfortunate... best thing you can do is find a little shop on the street and sit for a while. Maybe only after the rain can one enjoy the momentary illusion that the city is clean.

In my many years as a judge, I've only handed down a few verdicts I could feel good about. I still remember the look on those two kids' faces when I broke up their little scuffle and told the aggressor to apologize. What, why are you laughing? Even the greatest justice must start from somewhere small.

Maybe Siracusa really is that hard to change. The gangs, the famiglie... They shared a womb with Siracusa and shaped it into the country it is today. But we can't take them for granted. We must believe that a different path exists.
There's nothing more valuable than these rare moments of peace. Conserviamo questi momenti.
There is no such thing as absolute justice, but I still invoke it!

Be it a famiglia, a society, or a country, people are often bound by mutual interest... I used to assume this was the way of the world, but Doctor, you showed me a different path. I hope we can share this mutual trust long into the future.
No matter what I might encounter, I will not back down.

Be it a famiglia, a society, or a country, people are often bound by mutual interest... I used to assume this was the way of the world, but Doctor, you showed me a different path. I hope we can share this mutual trust long into the future.
Can crimes be punished through methods outside of the law?

Row.Text: Naturally, they and the darkness behind them will occasionally prevail... But mark my words, even the most frustrating rainy season will pass in time. Until then, all we can do is persevere, and keep trying.

Naturally, they and the darkness behind them will occasionally prevail... But mark my words, even the most frustrating rainy season will pass in time. Until then, all we can do is persevere, and keep trying.
This time, I will hand down a fair verdict.
This time, I will hand down a fair verdict.
Even a crime-ridden swamp is not beyond salvation. Thank you for once again reminding me of this fact.
Your crimes are irrefutable.
There is no such thing as absolute justice, but I still invoke it!

In my many years as a judge, I've only handed down a few verdicts I could feel good about. I still remember the look on those two kids' faces when I broke up their little scuffle and told the aggressor to apologize. What, why are you laughing? Even the greatest justice must start from somewhere small.
Your crimes are irrefutable.

They say 'the law is the basis of morality,' but that's not a natural truth. It emerges from a consensus of the people. When the people come to see violence as order, the law is nothing but a fantasy to dream of. And I, as the keeper of that fantasy, am the most ridiculous of all.
Still Texas of Penguin Logistics; she says she's just put some new clothes on. But you can tell there's a mood about her, and its fateful name is Anger.
Texas the Omertosa
Penguin Logistics employee, last surviving member of the Texas family, excellent solo combat ability.

Texas is often one of the first agents to enter the battlefield. With her abilities, we can build a first line of defense and accelerate the guidance of other agents to their positions. Her sword rain infused with Originium Arts can often hinder the movement of enemies on a large scale. Carefully observe the battlefield and deploy it to the appropriate location, she will not disappoint you.

Imaging tests reveal clear, normal outlines of internal organs, and no abnormal shadows have been detected. Originium granules have not been detected in the circulatory system and there is no sign of infection. At this time, this operator is believed to be uninfected. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][Cell-Originium Assimilation] 0% [NEWLINE]Operator Texas shows no signs of Originium infection. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][Blood Originium-Crystal Density] 0.12u/L [NEWLINE]To be able to avoid infection in such a dangerous environment is a minor miracle, and testament to Operator Texas's abilities.

An old friend of Rhodes Island. [NEWLINE]Many were shocked when Texas came to Rhodes Island with the two who would later become Vigil and Penance, as she looked unmistakably Siracusan. [NEWLINE]Those who knew her were uneasy about her return to Siracusa. Though it was well-known that she had something to do with the country, no one knew what lay in her past. [NEWLINE]Their minds were set at ease by the fact that she was joined by Penguin Logistics members. After all, Texas would be Texas as long as she was with Penguin Logistics. [NEWLINE]However, when it was learned what happened to her and Siracusa, and who she had brought to Rhodes Island, a consensus was quickly reached: [NEWLINE]Don't mess with Texas.

For Texas, Giovanna and Lappland each represented her past lives in Columbia and Siracusa. [NEWLINE]If not for what had happened 7 years ago, she might have become a reticent Lappland, or a cold-blooded Giovanna. [NEWLINE]Lappland symbolized hysteria toward Siracusa; she could not face it, but there was nowhere else to go to. [NEWLINE]Giovanna represented apprehension toward Columbia; she knew she did not have to do it, but she did not know what else to do. [NEWLINE]Texas knows that she would have walked the same paths as them, if she had not run away from it all. [NEWLINE]Whenever she came face-to-face with Lappland and Columbia, it filled her with nostalgia, but guilt as well. [NEWLINE]That is why she tolerated Lappland's actions, and accepted Giovanna's reproach. She was a Texas, no matter how much she detested everything to do with the family. [NEWLINE]She knew the price she paid when she chose to step away from it all. [NEWLINE]Was it worth it? [NEWLINE]She asked herself this many times, and unsurprisingly was never able to find the answer. [NEWLINE]After leaving Columbia and Siracusa, she desperately sought a new life to replace the old one. [NEWLINE]For her, life is not about searching for meaning; it was life itself that was worth searching for. [NEWLINE]Fortunately, she found what she was looking for.

Texas and Penguin Logistics did not stay in Nuova Volsinii for long. [NEWLINE]She returned to Lungmen with the other members soon after the events concluded. Penguin Logistics reopened, and there did not seem to be any changes in their lives. [NEWLINE]But she also meant her promise to Vigil: she would be there when Nuova Volsinii needs her. [NEWLINE]Nuova Volsinii was established with Signora Sicilia's blessing, and thus most of the families have chosen to sit on the sidelines, keeping an eye on developments. However, this is no more than the calm before the storm. [NEWLINE]Texas knows this, as do the rest of Penguin Logistics. [NEWLINE]At present, the main reason for them to travel between Lungmen and Nuova Volsinii is not so much Texas as Sora. [NEWLINE]The success of La Morte di Texas made Sora a star, prompting Monster Siren Records to change its strategy and encourage her to continue her activities in Siracusa. Nuova Volsinii presents an ideal platform for Sora in more ways than one. [NEWLINE]It was Sora, then, who has to regularly make the trip to Nuova Volsinii. [NEWLINE]Meanwhile, not wishing to let this opportunity go to waste, Croissant approached Bison and is trying to work with MountainDash Logistics and Vigil to build an international logistics route. It is a monumental task, but Croissant seems to enjoy it. [NEWLINE]Exusiai, for her part, has made it her mission to try every pizza parlor in Siracusa and find the best. [NEWLINE]For now, Texas is the one who is most idle. [NEWLINE]She knows, however, that there is something tying them together. They will always be together, whether going forwards or backwards.
Texas Tradition
Likes civilizations from her home continent, and wants to expand to all continents. Doesn‚Äôt like civilizations on continents where Siracusa has no city.
(You share the same home continent)
Texas is pleased you share the same home continent
(You have a presence on a continent she wants to settle.)
Texas wants to expand to a continent you occupy

Replace.Text: I'm your bodyguard again, just like old times. And it's not just a job, it's a reunion. That's something worth cherishing.
I still have a lot to take care of before I can enjoy a peaceful life, and if the only way to shake the past is to smash it to pieces, then that's exactly what I'll do. Simple as that.

The Siracusan rainy season always gets my tail wet, so I prefer the climate here. Don't worry, Exusiai and the girls will keep taking care of the deliveries, but I'll handle any jobs assigned to me personally.
I'm your bodyguard again, just like old times. And it's not just a job, it's a reunion. That's something worth cherishing.
I still have a lot to take care of before I can enjoy a peaceful life, and if the only way to shake the past is to smash it to pieces, then that's exactly what I'll do. Simple as that.
Bad luck, you ran into me.
Great, this place is the same as it ever was. Morning. Got any new plans?
Where's the hair dryer? I'd like to dry my tail.
This place reminds me of Lungmen. It's quiet. Doesn't have the constant pitter patter of the rain.
Where's the hair dryer? I'd like to dry my tail.
Great, this place is the same as it ever was. Morning. Got any new plans?
Alright. Try to keep up. Let me know if you can't.
Got a problem that needs solving?
The only way to solve a problem is to clear all the obstacles in the way, no matter what they might be and keep moving.
Bad luck, you ran into me.
The only way to solve a problem is to clear all the obstacles in the way, no matter what they might be and keep moving.

How does it feel to be back in Siracusa? Not great. It's for wise guys and famiglie, not me. I'm only staying long enough to cut ties with the past. After I'm done washing my hands of the whole business, I'm heading back to Lungmen to pick up the girls, and then going out for a nice drive.
Don't leave bloodstains. They're hard to clean.

Row.Text: There's still more to clean. When's our next sweep?
There's still more to clean. When's our next sweep?
Order confirmed, crystal clear.
Pass on your last words? No.
A battle without an explosion or cheering makes me feel a little uneasy. Let's head back. A drink? Maybe next time.
Pass on your last words? No.
Need speed to succeed.
Doesn't seem much different from your average delivery run in Lungmen.
All I ask is that we continue to get along just like we used to. This relationship, built on real trust, is hard to find here.
Doesn't seem much different from your average delivery run in Lungmen.
Just pray. Pray that she will listen to your orders.
Lappland

Lappland's real identity is unknown, her background a mystery. She has demonstrated impressive destructive prowess in tactical assaults and search-and-destroy missions. [NEWLINE]She is currently a special ops Operator for Rhodes Island.

Some people believe that Lappland is a crazy wolf, while others believe that Lappland is covering up her anxiety about the Syracuse order with madness. This may also explain her special treatment of Texas, as she wants to find a crazy way out for Siracusa in Texas. For Lappland, fancy swordsmanship did not add much color to the battle, on the contrary, she preferred direct confrontation. By destroying the enemy's special abilities through spiritual destruction, Lappland is able to quickly pull both sides of the battle to similar levels, only engaging in pure strength competitions. Of course, this strategy is not always effective. For some units, tough pressure can actually break the shackles on their bodies.

Imaging test for this Operator showed blurry outline of internal organs with visible unusual dark spots. Unusually high concentration of Originium particles were present in her circulation, indicating signs of infection and confirming her as infected at this stage. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][Cell-Originium Assimilation] 13% [NEWLINE]Operator Lappland showed a massive amount of crystal formation. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][Blood Originium-Crystal Density] 0.27u/L [NEWLINE]Strict monitoring of Operator Lappland's condition is required.

We have struggled to understand Lappland's personality. Some consider her simply mad, despite how polite and personable she can be in daily life. She actively seeks out people to converse with, indulging her taste for gallows humor, eager to see how her conversation partners will respond. Still, we know Lappland to be a dangerous element, and even at her most well-behaved, she remains frightening. [NEWLINE]Lappland has been marked for close medical observation due to severe symptoms of Oripathy. [NEWLINE]According to as yet unconfirmed reports, Lappland might have come from a certain family in Siracusa known for moving in certain dangerous circles, but scouring all active and inactive lists involving Siracusa failed to connect Lappland to any of the families. Because of the extreme risk involved in probing the Siracusan families, the investigation has been terminated.

Lappland's Oripathy symptoms go beyond the physical to cause an abnormal obsession toward a certain target of hers, even spurring her to excessive violence. [NEWLINE]Although Rhodes Island has exerted some degree of control over her behavior while deployed, she still does more or less whatever she wants in battle, which has been a problem for coordinated operations with her teammates. [NEWLINE]Lappland's rather unique symptoms seem to enhance her fighting abilities‚Äîvery rare among Infected. Her weapon, a specially designed eastern-style sword, complements her Arts. She appears to wield her Originium power untrained, through raw talent alone. Even though Lappland's powers decay rapidly when released, her deceptive fighting style and explosive offensive abilities have allowed her to master her weaknesses. [NEWLINE]Furthermore, Lappland's uncanny ability to discern weakness neutralizes virtually any advantage an opponent with Originium power or other special ability may have. She is able to counter her enemy's attacks completely after only a few moments of observation.

Based on scattered reports and eyewitness accounts, Operator Lappland has a close personal connection to Penguin Logistics employee Texas, a liaison from the company to Rhodes Island. Texas, for her part, makes a concerted effort to avoid contact with Lappland. Still, in situations where they were forced to work together, Lappland has not gone out of her way to antagonize Texas. In fact, she seems to be taking some degree of pleasure in Texas playing hard-to-get, as it were. [NEWLINE]Lappland treats other PL personnel cordially, but they have not warmed to her, and their meetings are always rather awkward (though thankfully rare). [NEWLINE]Lappland tries to get along with other Rhodes Island Operators, as long as no one gets in her way. [NEWLINE][Classified Log] [NEWLINE]All Lupus Operators display a guarded reaction to Operator Projekt Red's presence, with Operator Lappland exhibiting the most intense, most uncontrollable aura of dread and animosity, as well as inexplicable-euphoria. Until a solution is devised to mitigate the tension, keeping the two separated is advised.
The Lies of Civilization

Never gives up items in a peace deal, and likes civilizations who match that approach. Dislikes civilizations who have capitulated or who have never gone to war. Grievances against this leader decay at twice the usual rate.
(You have fought and not capitulated in a peace deal)
If someone's out for revenge on you, don't hesitate, just take them out. Once you decide to pick up a weapon, you don't need a reason to kill.
(You have never gone to war or have capitulated in a peace deal.)
Lappland wants to see you fight or knows you paid for peace.

Replace.Text: A great evil stands in the way of justice. In the name of hatred and revenge, lead the weak onward!
Haha, you people... I don't think I'll even remember your faces after this one... Anyway, let's just get started.
If someone's out for revenge on you, don't hesitate, just take them out. Once you decide to pick up a weapon, you don't need a reason to kill.
Hahaha! Bene! I love how much you trust me. You can't say the same for Texas, right?
You think I'm an assassin, huh? Yeah, alright. Call me whatever you want. I can be anyone, do anything, kill anyone anytime. Just so long as I want to!
We're fighting you guys? Then please do your bestest job, or I'll be really bored.
I love power. Honestly, the only joy I get out of this insane world is using my power to conquer it.
The more I get to know you, the better I understand Texas. I Love it.
The more I get to know you, the better I understand Texas. I Love it.
Hahaha, sliced 'em up like a millefoglie. How do you like it?
Bravo! Now I want to crush them that much harder! Hahaha!
Not my best work. You can lay it on me for letting a few get away.
Don't you just love how I keep getting more and more powerful?
Haha, you people... I don't think I'll even remember your faces after this one... Anyway, let's just get started.
It's been a while... I see that Texas made some friends. Hehehe... Affascinante! Can't wait to get to know them!
Sleep tight... enjoy your sweet dreams while you still can.

Row.Text: Bravo! Now I want to crush them that much harder! Hahaha!
Bravo! Now I want to crush them that much harder! Hahaha!
Show me what you've got.
You'll have to try harder than that!
It's over? Ah, che noia!
C'mon! C'eri quasi, tesoro!
Make Texas the leader!
Hahaha, sliced 'em up like a millefoglie. How do you like it?
Haha, you people... I don't think I'll even remember your faces after this one... Anyway, let's just get started.
Solid positioning.
